author: Bernie Hart
title: Why We Don't Fix People
preview: At Understanding Us, we have a hard rule: we are not clinicians. We realized early on that trying to 'fix' someone often robs them of the agency they need to heal themselves.

author: Marita Hart
title: 5,000 Burritos Later
preview: Reflecting on a year of hospitality. It’s not just about the food; it’s about the consistency. When the coffee is there at 9:30 AM every single day, trust begins to form.
